title: The Draymond Green Show - Dray's Return Date, LeBron's Historic Night + a Miles Bridges Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Dray's Return Date, LeBron's Historic Night + a Miles Bridges Interview
description:
Draymond Green announces on his show when he’s hoping to return to the court for the Golden State Warriors. He also talks through LeBron James’s incredible game against the Warriors last Saturday, Kevin Durant’s return to the Nets, and Jayson Tatum’s monster game against Brooklyn. Then Dray welcomes on Miles Bridges to discuss his upcoming restricted free agency, why playing with LaMelo Ball is so fun, what it’s like having Michael Jordan be his team’s owner, the most improved player award race, the problems with Michigan high school basketball, how Draymond helped guide him to the NBA, and the best rappers in the NBA. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
